Description: SX VTG MN H-stop VWH Liquid Series Offset Electric RH Lemon Yellow Cream Guitar Read Buyer’s Notice below – BEFORE you bid. You are looking at a SX VTG MN H-stop VWH Liquid series custom handmade offset electric right-hand guitar. I’m downsizing my collection and this nice guitar isn’t getting the attention it needs. The offset shape of the guitar is bit like the Fender's Jazzmaster or Jaguar. It sports a solid alder body, one volume and one tone control knobs, and a 3-way pickup selector switch to create an incredible range of sounds. The maple neck has an adjustable 2-way truss rod with rosewood re-enforcement for added stability. The ultra-fast Rosewood fretboard has 22-frets, the tailpiece has 6-adjustable saddle bridges. The humbucker pickups sound great. I’ve really enjoyed this nice guitar! Has the 6-original SX tuners with D’Addario strings with .009 as the highest string. The original white tri-layered (white, black, white) pick-guard and 4-verticle stripes compliment the lemon yellow color body beautifully. Weighs in at 8-9 pounds, overall length is 41” (due to offset). Width at the widest point is 14”, the neck is 1 5/8” graduating at 2” joining with the body. Scale is 25½”, body is 20” long (due to offset), upper body width is 11” wide, lower body width is 14” wide, waist is 8½” wide. One strap holder nut at the top and another one on the bottom. Note – strings will be loosened for shipping. And, under the vertical stripes, there appears to be 2-spots of cracking/flaws in the paint, one on the front top above the pickguard, and one on the back an inch or so down (see pictures). Sold as-is, no returns, no guarantees. Guitar stand is NOT included. **BUYERS NOTICE** BEFORE YOU BID or COMMIT TO PURCHASE: SX VTG guitar is sold as-is, no guarantees, no returns. I do my best to disclose all about the item. I pack each item with care & shippers may not treat the package with the same care. If you have shipping problems, you must resolve them with the shipper. In accordance with eBay policy, you agree to pay for your item within 48-hours from the close of auction. After 48-hours, I reserve the right to open an eBay unpaid item case, which may affect your positive standing. But, I am willing to work with buyers who communicate with me. You must fully agree to these terms (mine & eBay’s) & understand the conditions, if not please move on. I reserve the right to cancel any bid that I feel is not legitimate or from an established buyer. Thanks for looking at my auction. Good luck bidding. If you have any questions, please contact me.
Title: SX VTG MN H-stop VWH Liquid Series Offset Electric RH Cream Guitar
ConditionDescription: Beautiful guitar, great condition, plays well. Two defects - paint cracking/flaws under striping (see description/pictures)
